amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-3 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 7, 8, 11, 12, 17, 20, 24, and 26.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
